articles.author: Alisha Ebrahimji, CNN
articles.title: Man to be freed after spending 43 years in prison for triple murder he didn't commit
articles.description: After spending 43 years behind bars for a crime he said he didn't commit, a Missouri man's conviction has been set aside, according to a news release from Jackson County Prosecutor Jean Peters Baker.
articles.content: (CNN)After spending 43 years behind bars for a crime he said he didn't commit, a Missouri man's conviction has been set aside, according to a news release from Jackson County Prosecutor Jean Peters B… [+3023 chars]

articles.author: Matt Rivers and Natalie Gallón, CNN
articles.title: Nicaraguan exiles blame Ortega regime for attacks after 'sham' election win

articles.author: Alisha Ebrahimji, CNN
articles.title: A man has spent 43 years in prison for a triple murder. He says he's innocent and prosecutors agree
articles.description: A Missouri man who has maintained his innocence in a triple murder got an opportunity to testify at a three-day hearing that could lead to his release after serving 43 years in prison. That decision is now in a judge's hands.
